title: HMZElidrissi
author: Hamza El Idrissi
description: I'm Hamza and I like building stuff using code, bringing ideas to life with 0's and 1's. When I'm not coding, I enjoy exploring new technologies and topics such as Music, Religion, Philosophy, and Psychology.
websiteDescription: This website is my digital playground where I share my thoughts, experiences, and projects. Additionally, I use this platform to document the valuable lessons and insights I gain as I progress in my software engineering endeavors. Join me as we explore the world of code, innovation, and creativity together!
contactInvite: If you have any inquiries or feedback, please don't hesitate to reach out via:
